page.title: 20PENTLAND PARK,near PENICUIK
page.content:
Susan Hodgson came into school to tell us about the idea of this new park. She told us rules to be kept when out in the hills.
1 Respect life in the country. 2 Fasten all gates. 3 Keep dogs under control. 4 Keep to paths. 5 Use gates and stiles. 6 Leave machinery alone. 7 Take your litter home. 8 Help to keep water clean. 9 Project wildlife and plants. 10 Guard against fire. 11 Make no unnecessary noise. 12 Take care on country roads.
{Ladywood Primary School {Primary 4 {Teachers}Mrs Macaulay Mrs Rutherford Mrs Brown
